title: The Foundation For Favor (Holly Furtick)
description: Real favor is built on a strong foundation. In “The Foundation Of Favor,” the first lady of Elevation Church, Holly Furtick, revisits the story of Mary to reveal more about the favor of God in our lives – and the role we have to play in it.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: Real favor is built on a strong foundation. In “The Foundation Of Favor,” the first lady of Elevation Church, Holly Furtick, revisits the story of Mary to reveal more about the favor of God in our lives – and the role we have to play in it.
